<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}

  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



**Requires a Scoped Token as the bearer token.**

Review the status of a check.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
